name: Downtime Detective
description:
Disillusioned Detective Dad is on leave from the force. His Job was hard but downtime is harder, until he starts to receive mysterious messages. Who's leaving behind these clues, where do they lead, and what does it all mean? Help Detective Dad get to the bottom of things in this Narrative 2D Platformer. 

This game was for: WeeklyGameJam / Week: 91 / Theme: Detective Text Adventure

TEAM: Writer/Narrative: Felmuffin / Code: Castriul / Art: ShainaSenpaii / Audio: Dr_Monkfish
